summary: My Chemical Romance, often called MCR, is an American rock band from New Jersey. The band, made up of Gerard Way, Ray Toro, Frank Iero, and Mikey Way, is known for its influence on 2000s rock music. They started in 2001 and released their first album in 2002. Their most popular album, "The Black Parade," came out in 2006 and was a big hit. The band broke up in 2013 but reunited in 2019, going on a tour that was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
title: My Chemical Romance
